extendedInfo.description: India is indeed incredible, one of the most vibrant countries in the world with varities of culture, living styles, food, weather, geographical elements etc.We are happy to bring our first Jigsaw puzzles or photo matching puzzles on this nation's various places, foods, animals, birds, cultures, dances etc.The Jigsaw puzzle (photo matching) offers around 50 unique puzzles to exercise your brain, mean time, you learn about the world's biggest democracy nation and their famous destination places, varied cultures, foods, dances, games etc.We have carefully chossen the jigsaw puzzle images to ensure you will delight your eyes, exercise your brains, and enjoy your free time with your android mobile devices.The puzzle app has wonderful background score, with sliding navigation for puzzles, remembers your resolved puzzles, offers three types of boards, 3X3, 4X4 and 5X5. You can drag and drop the puzzle images to form the actual image. The app also shows you the total number of moves and the time you have taken to resolve the puzzle.As you all know, India is one of the most sought after travel destination for everyone around the world. This is the nation with passion, and the people are its own strength. Each state in India follows a unique culture, food, life-style, dances, music etc.As the historians used to comapre India with entire Europe but under one governance. We are bringing various historical & important places, moments, animals, birds etc through this puzzle.Below are the list of puzzle images you will be solving on this app.1. Taj Mahal - Tajmahal at the banks of Agra River 2. Brahadeeswara Temple in Tamilnadu - World's largest Hindu Temple as of 19th Centure 3. Ooty & Kodaikanal - Beautiful Natural Scenarios 4. Elephants - One of the important animals of India, mixed in Indian Cultures, festive seasons etc 5. India Gate 6. Indian Red Fort - Indian Parlimentary functions here 7. Kashmir - Kashmiri Traditional Dances 8. Bengal Tiger - Another Animal for what India is famous for 9. Peacock - India's national bird, the bird is of vary unique and only be found in India with various colors, the peacock blue is being the face of India, the color used by Indian  Cricket Team, Indian Movies etc10. Golden Temple - Punjab11. Lord Buddha - Buddhism12. Kerala - God's Own Country, Green nature & sceneries13. Puducherry14. Goa - Most famous of its resorts and beaches15. Manipur Dance16. Gujarat17. Lakshdweep.........And many more such puzzles...So what are you waiting for, go ahead and download the app, start touring your self in India with this unique Jigsaw Puzzle app. You will be delighted with various aspects and elements of India, Asia's fastest growing country.Please do leave a reply and do rating of our app.

reviews.title: A fabulous one guys
reviews.comment: I was looking for jigsaw puzzles and happy found this one from all other craps :)
reviews.author: Sudhakar Kanakaraj
